persian-calendar/date-format.description: Date input format of show-date, min-date, max-date

persian-calendar/min-date.description: Limit minimum time to navigate to

persian-calendar/max-date.description: Limit minimum time to navigate to

persian-calendar/disable-today.description: If set, Today button and today mark won't show

persian-calendar/disable-period.description: If set, Period change button won't show

persian-calendar/hide-event-times.description: If set, Event date and time won't show

persian-calendar/hide-month-shadow.description: If set, Shadow of days not in showing month won't show

persian-calendar/hide-past-days-shadow.description: If set, Shadow of past days won't show
